20101229020632.000|20101229020633.000|CC1|TUESDAY.

20101229020634.000|20101229020636.000|CC1|BROKE INTO AN HOUR WHEN THEIR   
20101229020636.000|20101229020637.000|CC1|BUSINESS.

20101229020639.000|20101229020640.000|CC1|CAUGHT ON VIDEO.

20101229020642.000|20101229020644.000|CC1|DIFFERENT SECURITY CAMERAS.

20101229020654.000|20101229020657.000|CC1|SEEN DRIVING AWAY IN A BLACK

20101229020659.000|20101229020701.000|CC1|IF YOU RECOGNIZE THESE MEN CALL 
20101229020701.000|20101229020702.000|CC1|THE POLICE.

20101229020706.000|20101229020706.000|CC1|BLIZZARD.

20101229020708.000|20101229020710.000|CC1|THE FLIGHTS TO NEW YORK AND NEW 
20101229020710.000|20101229020712.000|CC1|JERSEY AFFECTED.                
20101229020712.000|20101229020713.000|CC1|MOST TRAVELERS HAVE REBOOKED

20101229020715.000|20101229020717.000|CC1|ARE NOT WAITING AT THE AIRPORT. 
20101229020717.000|20101229020719.000|CC1|IF YOU HAVE A FLIGHT THAT IS    
20101229020719.000|20101229020721.000|CC1|HEADED OUT AND YOU ARE STILL ARE

20101229020723.000|20101229020726.000|CC1|BEFORE SHOWING UP.

20101229020730.000|20101229020732.000|CC1|RICK: UP NEXT THE CALIFORNIA    
20101229020732.000|20101229020733.000|CC1|PILOT TO SHOT FOOTAGE OF 40     
20101229020733.000|20101229020735.000|CC1|CALLS A SECURITY LAPSES THE ONE 
20101229020735.000|20101229020737.000|CC1|IN TROUBLE.
